name: CoMe! - Connect and Merge
description:
The most beautiful number puzzle game for you.
It's easy to play for everyone, however it could also drive genius crazy.
Explore this little game's deep challenge and practice your mind beyond imagination..

CoMe! is a block puzzle game. Your aim is to merge blocks to get higher blocks on the board.

Match three blocks with the same number & color next to each other to merge them, horizontally, vertically, or both.

Beware, fellow puzzler, the road to glory is paved with limited space, tricky merges and totally random blocks!

HOW TO PLAY :
Tap the adjacent blocks to swap them to match 3 blocks with the same color. Then, they become 1 and grow up.

Features:
● Easy to play, hard to master
● Simple and colorful design
● Beautiful music and sounds
● Get high score on Game Center
● Tablets supported
● Share your score with friends on facebook, twitter, imessage, ...
● Available change skin, change background

ENJOY IT!
